name: nativescript-photoviewer
description: A simple Photo-viewer component for NativeScript based on NYTPhotoViewer pod for iOS.

scripts.tsc.dist: npm run dist.clean && tsc -skipLibCheck --outDir dist && npm run dist.copy
scripts.dist.copy: cp -R platforms dist && cp ../README.md dist && cp photoviewer.d.ts dist && cp package.json dist
scripts.link: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo-ng.ios: npm run preparedemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo-js.ios: npm run preparedemo-js && cd ../demo-js && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns run ios
scripts.test: npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && cd ../demo && tns build ios
scripts.test.ios: cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns test ios --emulator
scripts.test.ios.device: cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns test ios
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-photoviewer && tns plugin add ../src && tns install
scripts.preparedemo-ng: npm run build && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-photoviewer && tns plugin add ../src && tns install
scripts.preparedemo-js: npm run build && cd ../demo-js && tns plugin remove nativescript-photoviewer && tns plugin add ../src && tns install
scripts.setup: npm run build && cd ../demo && npm i
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-photoviewer && cd ../src
scripts.setupandinstall: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../src
scripts.development.setup: npm run setup && npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-photoviewer && cd ../src
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" tns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo/typings!'
